page.description: Hides a popup "wait" message that was displayed on the client.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Hide a 'Wait...' message]* action can be used to hide a wait message that was previous displayed to the user using another action (such as [Display a 'Wait...' message] or the UX component's [showWaitMessage()] Javascript method.

section.title: Specify Wait Message To Hide Properties

item.name: Hide which message
item.description: Specify if you want to hide all open wait messages, or a specific wait message. Choices include *[ui:All open wait messages]*, *[ui:Specific wait message]*.

item.name: Lock what
item.description: Specify the part of the page to that the wait message has locked. Choices include *[ui:Container]*, *[ui:Element]*, *[ui:Panel]*, *[ui:Page]*.

item.name: Container Id
item.description: Specify the Id of the container.

item.name: Panel Id
item.description: Specify the Id of the panel.

item.name: Element Id
item.description: Specify the Id of the element.
